page.title: 20ELECTRICITY / IMPROVEMENTS
page.content:
{ELECTRICITY THE LINE OF PYLONS CROSSING THE CENTRE OF THE BLOCK E.TO W. ARE PART OF THE NATIONAL GRID AND CARRY 400,000 VOLTS WHICH IS REDUCED TO 132,000 AT THE SUBSTATIONS, ONE OF WHICH IS HONITON. PYLONS ARE 1/4 MILE APART AND HAVE 24 WIRES EACH. {RECOMMENDED IMPROVEMENTS} UNDERGROUND CABLES- TO ERADICATE UGLY PYLONS. TIDYING OF VERGES AND CLEAR SIGNPOSTING AT HEATHPARK. A373 ROAD IMPROVEMENTS- DANGEROUSLY OVERUSED BY HEAVY LORRIES FROM THE MOTORWAY. MORE LEISURE & SPORTS FACILITES TO KEEP UP WITH NEW HOUSING IN HONITON. ******************
Contributed by AWLISCOMBE V.P. SCHOOL.
